name: yutori
description: A programming language for describing Linear Optimisation prblems. We create an *abstract syntax tree* of symbolic algebraic algebra. A computer algebra system then simplifies the expressions.

name: [Anki-Panky](https://github.com/kamalsacranie/anki-panky)
description: Markdown to [Anki](https://apps.ankiweb.net) deck compilation programme written in Haskell. Parse Markdown using [Pandoc](https://pandoc.org) to produce individual card ASTs which are then compiled into an Anki database.

name: OCamlbinators
description: A novel parser combinator library for creating source-mapped ASTs useful for creating developer tooling. Source metadata data can be colocated with AST data types which can be used by tooling for great static analysis.

name: Fuzzy Camls
description: A synthetic data generator that takes a `EBNF`-style grammar and randomly generates source data based on the user-specified grammar. Developed for fuzz-testing parsers.

name: Kamal's World
description: From-scratch game engine written in C++ using OpenGL. Objects can be parsed in or procedurally generated and textures can be applied to objects. A very OO heavy project.

name: Flower Stamp
description: U-Net architecture neural network used to segment pictures of flowers for lazer cutting stamps.
